params.name: element
params.description: The link text of the element to click on. This can be a keyword from the element text.

name: scroll
description: Scroll the web page in a specified direction by a modest amount or to page boundaries.

params.name: direction
params.description: The direction to scroll. Valid values are 'up', 'down', 'left', or 'right'. Use 'up' to scroll toward the top of the page, 'down' toward the bottom, etc.

params.name: bound
params.description: Controls scroll behavior: IMPORTANT - For commands like 'scroll down' or 'scroll up a bit', set this to FALSE to perform a modest scroll. ONLY set to TRUE when specifically asked to go to page extremes with commands like 'scroll to the bottom' or 'go to the top of the page'.

params.name: field
params.description: The link text of the field to input into. This can be a keyword from the field text.
